ygData.subject: RE: CHR and Bards...
ygData.msgSnippet: Crier, I would like to get my hands on one of them there Crested Helms, been wanting one for a long time...can you give me any insight into your group s level
ygData.messageBody:
Crier,

I would like to get my hands on one of them there Crested Helms, been
wanting one for a long time...can you give me any insight into your group's
level range and what mob in particular drops it? I is the rare drop, right?
I just camped 20 hours this past weekend to get a pair of Dwarven Workboots
I had been wanting for a long time and here is what I learned about them,
tell me if the crested helm compares:

Dwarven Ghost spawns every 20 minutes, sometimes a Festering Hag spawns in
his placeholder. You see the ghost maybe once or twice an hour. The ghost
drops the boots about 1 out of every 9 or 10 spawns. This means you might
see the boots once every 5 hours if you are lucky, sometimes once every 10.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
> Sent: Monday, November 01, 1999 10:53 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] CHR and Bards...
>
>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> John, my group killed the mob for a Crested Helm in Mistmoore
> (AC 10, +6
> STR, +3 CHA, weight 5.0) and I won the lotto. Pretty nice
> piece for bards -
> looks like steel plate.
>
> Got my Black Silk Gloves too, but my Elf-Hides are so much
> better. Sigh...
> I want to be all blue but some of the pieces of Lambent just
> aren't as good
> as other things. I don't want to be a rainbow bard any
> longer though. I've
> got mixed Lambent, Steel and Bronze. I'm ugly! This will never do!
>
> Crier Sharpsong - Vain 29th song bard on Fennin Ro
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> > Sent: Monday, November 01, 1999 9:43 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com

> >

> > >
> > > Ok, John (Kim)... been reading about your CHR for a few
> > > weeks now, and I have to ask: "What items do you wear?"
> >
> > Base chr 110
> > +5 chr Opalline Earrings (x2)
> > +5 dex/+7 chr star ruby(?) electrum rings (x2)
> > +1 chr Full lambent armor except the breastplate (x6)
> >
> > I'm still trying to get a guise of the deceiver (the spot is
> > rarely not camped), and eventually a new headpiece. I really
> > don't know if there's any point to higher charisma anymore, as
> > it doesn't seem to help avoid the "brokenness" of Lullaby and
> > Pixie Strike.
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
> > kim@...

> > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> > toren@... with the subject lol.
